headline.main: SOVIET LOOKS AHEAD TO VICTORY IN 1943; Foe's Gains Called Temporary -- Nazi Sees 30-Year War

lead_paragraph: MOSCOW, Sept. 1 (U.P.) -- Russian newspapers noted the war's third anniversary today with editorials expressing confidence that the fourth year of the conflict would bring decisive defeat to Germany.
abstract: Dr A Rosenberg warns Ger pub of possible 30-yrs war
snippet: MOSCOW, Sept. 1 (U.P.) -- Russian newspapers noted the war's third anniversary today with editorials expressing confidence that the fourth year of the conflict would bring decisive defeat to Germany....
